songs.title: Never Gonna Give You Up
songs.description: A classic 1987 pop song that became an internet meme known as 'Rickrolling'.

songs.title: Smells Like Teen Spirit
songs.description: One of the most iconic grunge anthems that defined the 1990s alternative rock scene.

songs.title: Johnny B. Goode
songs.description: A pioneering rock and roll song that influenced generations of musicians.

songs.title: Like a Rolling Stone
songs.description: A revolutionary song in folk rock, considered one of the greatest songs of all time.

songs.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
songs.description: A progressive rock masterpiece blending opera and hard rock elements.

songs.title: Billie Jean
songs.description: One of the most famous songs in pop music history, known for its iconic bassline.

songs.title: Californication
songs.description: A song that captures the band's signature blend of rock and funk.

songs.title: Gangnam Style
songs.description: A viral sensation that became the first YouTube video to reach one billion views.

songs.title: Despacito
songs.description: One of the most streamed songs ever, blending Latin pop and reggaeton influences.

songs.title: Flowers
songs.description: A self-empowerment anthem reflecting on personal growth and independence.
achievements: Broke Spotify streaming records upon release.
Topped global charts for multiple weeks.

songs.title: Apt.
songs.description: A collaboration blending K-pop and R&B elements, showcasing both artists' vocal prowess.
achievements: Surpassed 100 million Spotify streams within seven days.
Reached one billion streams on Spotify in 100 days.
Debuted at number one on both the Billboard Global 200 and Global Excl. US charts.
